00019 #ifndef HWLOC_OPENFABRICS_VERBS_H

00048 static inline int
00049 hwloc_ibv_get_device_cpuset(hwloc_topology_t topology ,
00050                             struct ibv_device *ibdev, hwloc_cpuset_t set)
00051 {
00052 #ifdef HWLOC_LINUX_SYS
00053   /* If we're on Linux, use the verbs-provided sysfs mechanism to
00054      get the local cpus */
00055 #define HWLOC_OPENFABRICS_VERBS_SYSFS_PATH_MAX 128
00056   char path[HWLOC_OPENFABRICS_VERBS_SYSFS_PATH_MAX];
00057   FILE *sysfile = NULL;
00058 
00059   if (!hwloc_topology_is_thissystem(topology)) {
00060     errno = EINVAL;
00061     return -1;
00062   }
00063 
00064   sprintf(path, "/sys/class/infiniband/%s/device/local_cpus",
00065           ibv_get_device_name(ibdev));
00066   sysfile = fopen(path, "r");
00067   if (!sysfile)
00068     return -1;
00069 
00070   hwloc_linux_parse_cpumap_file(sysfile, set);
00071   if (hwloc_bitmap_iszero(set))
00072     hwloc_bitmap_copy(set, hwloc_topology_get_complete_cpuset(topology));
00073 
00074   fclose(sysfile);
00075 #else
00076   /* Non-Linux systems simply get a full cpuset */
00077   hwloc_bitmap_copy(set, hwloc_topology_get_complete_cpuset(topology));
00078 #endif
00079   return 0;
00080 }
00081 
00098 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00099 hwloc_ibv_get_device_osdev_by_name(hwloc_topology_t topology,
00100                                    const char *ibname)
00101 {
00102         hwloc_obj_t osdev = NULL;
00103         while ((osdev = hwloc_get_next_osdev(topology, osdev)) != NULL) {
00104                 if (HWLOC_OBJ_OSDEV_OPENFABRICS == osdev->attr->osdev.type
00105                     && osdev->name && !strcmp(ibname, osdev->name))
00106                         return osdev;
00107         }
00108         return NULL;
00109 }

00114 #ifdef __cplusplus
00115 } /* extern "C" */
00116 #endif
